resources.string: Take the Covid-19 Quiz
Covid-19 Quiz
What item was made famous by panic buying when COVID-19 first hit headlines?
Fly Spray
Toilet Paper
Socks
What country did COVID-19 originate from?
Country
Which statements are NOT true? (check all that apply)
COVID-19 can only affect the Elderly and is not dangerous to others.
By practicing Social Distancing we can help stop the spread of COVID-19.
Drinking alcohol daily can greatly reduce your chances of infection for COVID-19.
You can reduce the chance of infection by washing your hands for at least 20 seconds with soapy water.
Which of the following images, best depicts images associated with COVID-19
Which of the following symptoms could indicate you have COVID-19? (check all that apply)
You have a dry cough
You like the colour purple.
You believe the earth is flat
You have fever like symptoms
You have a sense of humor
What is the recommended distance you should observe when practicing social distancing?
Try to keep 1 mile between you and any international arrivals.
You can avoid social distancing just by wearing a mask.
Keep at minimum 1.5 meters between yourself and other members of the public.
Social distancing is only an excuse not to visit relatives.
What is this sign telling you to wear?
Image Wear Face Mask
Image of Robo Virus
Image of Corona Virus
Image of Blob Virus
Glasses
Helmet
Lipstick
Mask
Feeling lucky? Hit the button below to see how you went.
Submit Answers
